block.p: Kristina Lindsey Needham, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. James M. Needham of Larchmont, N.Y., was married yesterday to William Gerald Schmitz Jr., a son of Mr. and Mrs. Schmitz of Park Ridge, Ill. The Rev. John P. Maloney performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of Our Saviour in New York.
The couple, both 27, graduated from Brown University.

Kristina Lindsey Needham, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. James M. Needham of Larchmont, N.Y., was married yesterday to William Gerald Schmitz Jr., a son of Mr. and Mrs. Schmitz of Park Ridge, Ill. The Rev. John P. Maloney performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of Our Saviour in New York.
The couple, both 27, graduated from Brown University.

Mrs. Schmitz, who received a law degree from Fordham University, is an associate at Cahill Gordon & Reindel, a New York law firm. Her father owns Fieldston Investors in New York. Her mother, Leslie Needham, retired as a speech therapist in New York.

Mr. Schmitz is a senior associate for acquisitions at Safeguard Scientifics, a holding company for Internet and communications concerns, in Wayne, Pa. His mother, Carol Schmitz, is a literacy specialist who tutors students at Newton Bateman Elementary School and other Chicago public schools. His father is the president of Arthur J. Rogers & Company, a real estate concern in Des Plaines, Ill.
